subject: World Cup 2014 (Soccer)
Soccer
lead_paragraph: A first-half hat trick by striker Le Cong Vinh helped Vietnam to a 6-0 thrashing of Macau as 2014 World Cup qualifying got under way in Asia.
snippet: A first-half hat trick by striker Le Cong Vinh helped Vietnam to a 6-0 thrashing of Macau as 2014 World Cup qualifying got under way in Asia.
